Hotel.name: Doubletree By Hilton Los Angeles Downtown

Description.Text: Set in a prime location of Los Angeles (CA), Doubletree by Hilton Los Angeles Downtown Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking, car park, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access â€“ wireless, whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's fitness center will further enhance your satisfying stay. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Los Angeles (CA), Doubletree by Hilton Los Angeles Downtown Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.
